column5: For those who suffer from dry and cracked skin....I started using this product a couple of weeks ago. Seems to work quite well !  :clapping:

Shoulda picked some up a few weeks ago, wearing gloves and sweating in them wreaked havoc on the fingertips and had similar looking cracked skin on the sides of most of my fingers, will have to pick some up!

Looks good . When I worked in waste water treatment in a steel mill I had similar hands, used Bag Balm from TSC and it worked good too. We had what they called a barrier cream at work that you put on before work that helped too.
I use it all the time. Constant hand sanitizer and hand washing kills my hands. Then throw saw dust on it lol
I use it all the time. Constant hand sanitizer and hand washing kills my hands. Then throw saw dust on it lol Good to Know
Thumbs up!  Corn Husker's Lotion and Udder Balm are also really popular.
My thumbs got in that condition mainly from washing my hands several times a day with hand soap that contains mineral spirits and pumice.
Great product!  I use it all the time.

My heels get calloused and cracked...every six weeks my podiatrist uses a tool like a Dremmel grinder to smooth them then I have been using O'Keefes foot cream along with a pummice stone...seems to be working well...any excess left over I use on my hands...LOL
Wow.... Those pictures say it all
